text: Jean-Baptiste Djebbari (born 26 February 1982) is the former Ministry of Transports of France.Décret du 3 septembre 2019 relatif à la composition du Gouvernement Before, he was airline pilot on Pilatus PC-12. A fost numit ministru delegat responsabil cu transporturile în noul guvern Jean Castex (3 iulie 2020).Décret du 6 juillet 2020 relatif à la composition du Gouvernement He graduated from ENAC and École polytechnique.Nomination - Jean-Baptiste Djebbari co-pilotera et structurera un nouveau fonds dont la vocation sera de contribuer à la décarbonation == References == Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the École Polytechnique Category:French businesspeople Category:People from Seine-et-Marne
title: Jean-Baptiste Djebbari
